name: Chidori
summary: A high-speed thrust enveloped in concentrated lightning chakra that pierces defenses.
technique: Compress lightning chakra into the dominant hand until audible chirping occurs.
Accelerate to high speed; lock target with tunnel-vision minimized.
Release in a single precise thrust at a vital or structural weak point.
training: Tree/water walking refinement to prevent chakra leak at fingertips.
Target cones: keep dispersion under 10cm at 5m.
Reaction drills: partner feints to reduce tunnel vision.
tips: Requires high-speed approach; Sharingan greatly mitigates tunnel vision.
Best used as a finisher or to break fortified defenses.

name: Lightning Release: Lightning Beast Tracking Fang
summary: Projects a hound-shaped lightning construct that chases and bites at the target.
technique: Form a tethered lightning construct with a defined head and forelimbs.
Guide via hand movements; maintain line-of-sight for optimal control.
Snap the 'jaw' closed to stun or bind on contact.
training: Slalom course: maintain pursuit around obstacles without snapping tether.
Latency reduction: practice micro-gestures for faster direction changes.
tips: Excellent for pursuit and crowd control.
Watered terrain amplifies conduction; beware friendly positions.

name: Lariat (Lightning Chakra Mode)
summary: A charging clothesline empowered by Lightning Release chakra to amplify speed, impact, and cutting force.
technique: Cloak body with dense lightning chakra to reduce drag and enhance muscle output.
Sprint on a curved approach to maximize rotational force.
Impact at shoulder/neck line; follow-through to sever or incapacitate.
training: Sprint repeats with timed entry into lightning cloak.
Impact dummies rated for edge trauma; measure penetration depth.
Partner drills for angle discipline and safe pull-through.
tips: Coordination with a second attacker (Double Lariat) can guarantee decapitation.
Avoid prolonged cloak activation to prevent strain and chakra burn.
